title: Independence National Historical Park: Deaf / Hearing Loss
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility     Deaf / Hearing Loss              Deaf / Hearing Loss       Films Open captions are available on all park films in the following buildings:  Benjamin Franklin Museum Declaration House Independence Visitor Center Liberty Bell Center New Hall  Assistive listening devices are available to borrow for the films and videos in the Benjamin Franklin Museum, as well as the films in the Independence Visitor Center, Liberty Bell Center and Declaration House. Printed information There is printed information available on the Liberty Bell and Independence Square buildings as well as in the park brochure. ASL interpretation American Sign Language interpretation is available by request (FREE).  Please call 215-597-7130 at least 14 days prior to your visit.
